snippet.title: Business Analyst
snippet.description: Shaping New Horizons Based in Nottingham's historic Lace Market, IIL is the latest Nottingham data and technology success story. Our core business is supplying information... we are part of that change as... average response time of 0.2 seconds. Over... now service some of the largest insurers... Business Analyst Purpose of the Role *... for * Execution of the product strategy...
